content.question: What is definitely true in the short run about the economy if real output begins to increase again after months of decline?

choices.label: The economy is falling into recession.
The economy is exiting a business cycle trough.
The purchasing power of nominal wages is increasing.

content.answer: The economy is exiting a business cycle trough.
